general.name: mos_target_bhm_rm_v0
general.description: Parent sample for the RM project, used to select confirmed and candidate quasar targets for the BHM-RM Program in SDSS-V. For more details please see Yang and Shen, (2022, https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2022arXiv220608989Y/abstract). This table contains all photometric objects detected in the COSMOS, SDSS-RM, XMM-LSS, CDFS, S-CVZ, and ELAIS-S1 fields., within a circular area of 10 degree^2 from the field center.

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

field_name.name: field_name
field_name.description: One of COSMOS, SDSS-RM, XMM-LSS, CDFS, S-CVZ, or ELAIS-S1

distance.name: distance
distance.description: Angular distance from the field center

pos_ref.name: pos_ref
pos_ref.description: Fiducial coordinates reference, priority: Gaia > DES > PS1 > NSC

ebv.name: ebv
ebv.description: Galactic E(B−V) reddening from Schlegel et al. (1998)

des.name: des
des.description: A flag set to 1 if in DES photometric catalog

extended_coadd.name: extended_coadd
extended_coadd.description: DES type classifier: 0 (high-confidence stars), 1 (likely stars), 2 (mostly galaxies), and 3 (high-confidence galaxies)

separation_des.name: separation_des
separation_des.description: Angular distance between DES position and the fiducial coordinates

ps1.name: ps1
ps1.description: A flag set to 1 if in PS1 photometric catalog

ra_ps1.name: ra_ps1
ra_ps1.description: PS1 right ascension from i filter stack detection

dec_ps1.name: dec_ps1
dec_ps1.description: PS1 declination from i filter stack detection

separation_ps1.name: separation_ps1
separation_ps1.description: Angular distance between PS1 position and the fiducial coordinates

nsc.name: nsc
nsc.description: A flag set to 1 if in  photometric catalog

separation_nsc.name: separation_nsc
separation_nsc.description: Angular distance between NSC position and the fiducial coordinates

sdss.name: sdss
sdss.description: A flag set to 1 if in SDSS photometric catalog

separation_sdss.name: separation_sdss
separation_sdss.description: Angular distance between SDSS position and the fiducial coordinates

gaia.name: gaia
gaia.description: A flag set to 1 if in Gaia DR2 photometric catalog

mg.name: mg
mg.description: Gaia g-band magnitude (phot_g_mean_mag in Gaia catalog, Vega)

pmra.name: pmra
pmra.description: Proper motion in RA direction, Angular Velocity,

pmra_error.name: pmra_error
pmra_error.description: Standard error of proper motion in RA direction, Angular Velocity,

pmdec.name: pmdec
pmdec.description: Proper motion in DEC direction, Angular Velocity,

pmdec_error.name: pmdec_error
pmdec_error.description: Standard error of proper motion in DEC direction, Angular Velocity,

pmsig.name: pmsig
pmsig.description: Proper motion significance defined as (pmra^2+pmdec^2)/sqrt(pmra^2*pmra_error^2 + pmdec^2*pmdec_error^2)

unwise.name: unwise
unwise.description: A flag set to 1 if in unWISE photometric catalog

separation_unwise.name: separation_unwise
separation_unwise.description: Angular distance between unWISE position and the fiducial coordinates

near_ir.name: near_ir
near_ir.description: A flag set to 1 if in NIR photometric catalog

survey_ir.name: survey_ir
survey_ir.description: Near-IR survey name: LAS, UHS, VHS, Viking, VMC, VIDEO

separation_ir.name: separation_ir
separation_ir.description: Angular distance between NIR position and the fiducial coordinates

optical_survey.name: optical_survey
optical_survey.description: Optical survey used in Skewt-QSO, e.g., DES, PS1, Gaia, NSC

mi.name: mi
mi.description: i-band PSF magnitude (galactic extinction not corrected)

cal_skewt_qso.name: cal_skewt_qso
cal_skewt_qso.description: A flag indicates whether Skewt-QSO is calculated.(Set to 1 when Nband_Optical_use > 2.)

nband_optical_use.name: nband_optical_use
nband_optical_use.description: Number of optical bands used in Skewt-QSQ.

use_unwise.name: use_unwise
use_unwise.description: Set to 1 when unWISE photometry is used in Skewt-QSO calculation.

use_nir.name: use_nir
use_nir.description: Set to 1 when NIR photometry is usedin Skewt-QSO calculation.

photo_combination.name: photo_combination
photo_combination.description: The photometric data combinations used in Skewt-QSO, for example, "DECam-YJHK-unWISE" - DECam/PS1 includes grizy bands; unWISE incldes unWISE W1 and W2 bands; and Gaia includes Gaia bp, g, and rp bands

log_qso.name: log_qso
log_qso.description: The (natural) logarithmic probability of a target fitting to QSO colors convolved with a QLF. Set to -323 if log_QSO<-323 (close to the lower limit of double-precision data).

log_star.name: log_star
log_star.description: The logarithmic probability of a target fitting to star colors multiplied by star number counts based on a stellar simulation. Set to -323 if log_Star<-323.

log_galaxy.name: log_galaxy
log_galaxy.description: The logarithmic probability of a target fitting to galaxy colors convolved with a GLF. Set to -323 if  log_Galaxy<-323.

p_qso.name: p_qso
p_qso.description: QSO probability from Skewt-QSO. P_QSO = exp(log_qso)/(exp(log_qso) + exp(log_star) + exp(log_galaxy))

class_skewt_qso.name: class_skewt_qso
class_skewt_qso.description: Classification based on the highest probability from Skewt-QSO, QSO/Star/Galaxy

skewt_qso.name: skewt_qso
skewt_qso.description: flag indicating whether the object is a QSO (same as class_skewt_qso, except additionally requiring log_QSO>-10). (P_QSO>P_Star & P_QSO>P_galaxy & log_QSO>-10)

p_qso_prior.name: p_qso_prior
p_qso_prior.description: QSO probability with prior probabilities from additional info, such as separation (between optical survey and unWISE), morphology, variability, and/or proper motion.(Note: *_Prior are generally not populated in this version, except for the "S-CVZ" field, where we take into account the separation between optical surveys and unWISE.)

class_skewt_qso_prior.name: class_skewt_qso_prior
class_skewt_qso_prior.description: Classification based on Skewt-QSO with prior probabilities described above.

skewt_qso_prior.name: skewt_qso_prior
skewt_qso_prior.description: flag indicating whether the object is QSO based on Skewt-QSO with prior probabilities described above.

photoz_qso.name: photoz_qso
photoz_qso.description: Photometric redshift of QSO from Skewt-QSO

prob_photoz_qso.name: prob_photoz_qso
prob_photoz_qso.description: The total probability of z located between photoz_QSO_lower and photoz_QSO_upper (assuming it is QSO).

photoz_galaxy.name: photoz_galaxy
photoz_galaxy.description: Photometric redshift of Galaxy from Skewt-QSO (fitting to galaxy colors).

pqso_xdqso.name: pqso_xdqso
pqso_xdqso.description: QSO probability from the public XDQSO catalog

photoz_xdqso.name: photoz_xdqso
photoz_xdqso.description: Photometric redshift of QSO from the public XDQSO catalog

prob_rf_gaia_unwise.name: prob_rf_gaia_unwise
prob_rf_gaia_unwise.description: AGN probability from the Gaia-unWISE AGN catalog

photoz_gaia_unwise.name: photoz_gaia_unwise
photoz_gaia_unwise.description: Photometric redshift from the Gaia-unWISE AGN catalog

des_var_sn_max.name: des_var_sn_max
des_var_sn_max.description: The signal-to-noise ratio of the measured intrinsic RMS in grizy bands (DES).

ps1_var_sn_max.name: ps1_var_sn_max
ps1_var_sn_max.description: The maximum signal-to-noise ratio of the measured intrinsic RMS over 5 bands (PS1).

spec_q.name: spec_q
spec_q.description: flag indicating if the object was spectroscopically confirmed as QSO from earlier surveys (-9=False, 1=True). Note that contents of this column are incorrect in this version of the table.

spec_bitmask.name: spec_bitmask
spec_bitmask.description: bitmask - bit 0: SDSS-DR14Q, bit 1: SDSS-DR7Q, bit 2: OzDES-DR1Q, bit 3: SDSS-RM_Q, bit 4: COSMOS_Q, bit 5: Milliquas_QA. (Note: Milliquas_QA=1 are objects spectroscopically classified as broad-line QSO/AGN in the Million Quasars (MILLIQUAS) catalog.)

specz.name: specz
specz.description: spectroscopic redshift from multiple surveys. Priority: SDSS-RM_Q/COSMOS_Q > SDSS-DR14Q > SDSS-DR7Q > OzDES-DR1Q > Milliquas_QA

photo_q.name: photo_q
photo_q.description: flag indicating if the object was selected as QSO in public photometric quasar catalogs.

photo_bitmask.name: photo_bitmask
photo_bitmask.description: bit mask, bit 0: XDQSO catalog, bit 1: Gaia-unWISE AGN catalog; bit 2: Milliquas_photo: photometric quasar candidates in the Milliquas catalog

photoz.name: photoz
photoz.description: Photometric redshift from public photometric quasar catalogs. Priority: XDQSO > Gaia-unWISE > Milliquas_photo

pqso_photo.name: pqso_photo
pqso_photo.description: QSO probability from public photometric quasar catalogs.

pk.name: pk
pk.description: primary key for the database table

imaflags_iso_g.name: imaflags_iso_g
imaflags_iso_g.description: DES flag identifying sources with missing/flagged pixels, considering all single epoch images

imaflags_iso_r.name: imaflags_iso_r
imaflags_iso_r.description: DES flag identifying sources with missing/flagged pixels, considering all single epoch images

imaflags_iso_i.name: imaflags_iso_i
imaflags_iso_i.description: DES flag identifying sources with missing/flagged pixels, considering all single epoch images

imaflags_iso_z.name: imaflags_iso_z
imaflags_iso_z.description: DES flag identifying sources with missing/flagged pixels, considering all single epoch images

imaflags_iso_y.name: imaflags_iso_y
imaflags_iso_y.description: DES flag identifying sources with missing/flagged pixels, considering all single epoch images

infoflag2_g.name: infoflag2_g
infoflag2_g.description: PS1 flags, values listed in DetectionFlags2

infoflag2_r.name: infoflag2_r
infoflag2_r.description: PS1 flags, values listed in DetectionFlags2

infoflag2_i.name: infoflag2_i
infoflag2_i.description: PS1 flags, values listed in DetectionFlags2

infoflag2_z.name: infoflag2_z
infoflag2_z.description: PS1 flags, values listed in DetectionFlags2

infoflag2_y.name: infoflag2_y
infoflag2_y.description: PS1 flags, values listed in DetectionFlags2

magerr_gaia_g.name: magerr_gaia_g
magerr_gaia_g.description: Gaia DR2 G-band magnitude error, Vega

magerr_gaia_bp.name: magerr_gaia_bp
magerr_gaia_bp.description: Gaia DR2 BP-band magnitude error, Vega

magerr_gaia_rp.name: magerr_gaia_rp
magerr_gaia_rp.description: Gaia DR2 RP-band magnitude error, Vega

des_var_nepoch_g.name: des_var_nepoch_g
des_var_nepoch_g.description: Number of DES single-epoch photometric datapoints per band

des_var_nepoch_r.name: des_var_nepoch_r
des_var_nepoch_r.description: Number of DES single-epoch photometric datapoints per band

des_var_nepoch_i.name: des_var_nepoch_i
des_var_nepoch_i.description: Number of DES single-epoch photometric datapoints per band

des_var_nepoch_z.description: Number of DES single-epoch photometric datapoints per band

des_var_nepoch_y.name: des_var_nepoch_y
des_var_nepoch_y.description: Number of DES single-epoch photometric datapoints per band

des_var_status_g.name: des_var_status_g
des_var_status_g.description: Status of intrinsic variability calculation from DES

des_var_status_r.name: des_var_status_r
des_var_status_r.description: Status of intrinsic variability calculation from DES
